            <string language="en-US">Ten Minute Grammar Lessons - Commas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-US</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">These lessons are intended to be used by English Language Arts teachers in grades 6-8 for a quick, whole-class review of the rules of comma usage.</string>
